item.title: [PI] Timer Saving - Again ;)
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

p.toString().length() wasn’t valid as I told you
You had to turn p.buydelay into a String object, such as String buyDelayString = “” + p.buydelay; and then you have to use buyDelayString.length() instead…

Next time read up on some java…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Timer Saving - Again ;)
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

I am trying to get my timer to save so people cannot log out and log in then click object again,
/Save Timer/
characterfile.write("character-buydelay = ", 0, 21);
characterfile.write(p.buydelay, 0, p.toString().length());
characterfile.newLine();

I am having a error,
characterfile.write(p.buydelay, 0, p.toString().length());
|
|

The | is pointing towards the “.”

Read full topic
